Name: Princess Maira: Initiation
About the game: TERMENO: ARCADES FOR THE WORLD Princess Maira: Initiation, is the first instalment in the new series taking place in very distant galaxy and not so distant future. Gameplay main hallmarks are fast-paced laser guns shootouts, punch 'n' kick melee combats, managing obby-like obstacles, using wits in overcoming deadly traps and exploring the story by help of witty dialogues. Epic saga, full of rich twists and unexpected revelations unfolds in the frame of 2D side-scroller arcade action game, bringing joy from both meticulously optimized gameplay and alluring story. MUST HAVE FOR LOVERS OF: - Arcade action 2D side-scrollers - Sci-fi laser guns shooters - Clever and daring obbies - Story rich games with witty dialogues - Female main protagonist games STORYLINE: ...in the very distant galaxy and not so distant future... Since her birth, princess Maira was destined to become monarch of prosperous and powerful planet called Vulcan. However, evil was lurking closer to her than she would have dared guessing. Now, it delivered its crushing blow. It might have been over so wrong. Except, Maira is a survivor. And fate has big plans with her. Taken by her kidnappers to odd planet she have never seen before, she must gather all her wits and embark on the journey of revenge and justice.
